content.question: Which of the following best summarizes the perspective of Adam Smith in the passage?

choices.label: A strong centralized government is necessary to maintain economic order.
Lowering taxes increases investment and allows the free market to flourish.
The government should not try to regulate manufacturing.
Civil liberties limit the power of the federal government to regulate the economy.

content.answer: The government should not try to regulate manufacturing.

topic.text: 4.1: American Attitudes About Government and Politics
